Hi Enore,

 

Are you talking about taking an antique sword and cutting a g=
roove in it? I
hope not. There is no one I know of in Japan who would do th=
at. And I think
you would be hard pressed to find someone who would even do=
 it to a newly
made blade. The sword comes as it is and anything added late=
r is typically
not seen as a good thing.

 

Gordon
